verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei Now after מ֥וֹת <S%H4194><s%> Mot the death מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh of Moses עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'E-ved the servant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh it came to pass that the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נ֔וּן <S%H5126><s%> Nun, of Nun מְשָׁרֵ֥ת <S%H8334><s%> me-sha-Ret minister מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses' לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses עַבְדִּ֖י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di my servant מֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> Met; is dead וְעַתָּה֩ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now ק֨וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum now therefore arise עֲבֹ֜ר <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Vor go over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den this Jordan הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am thou and all this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz unto the land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten which I do give לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei to them [even] to the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Every מָק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ma-Kom, Every place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּדְרֹ֧ךְ <S%H1869><s%> tid-Roch shall tread upon כַּֽף־ <S%H3709><s%> kaf- that the sole רַגְלְכֶ֛ם <S%H7272><s%> rag-le-Chem of your foot בּ֖וֹ bo לָכֶ֣ם la-Chem נְתַתִּ֑יו <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Tiv; that have I given כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti unto you as I said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. unto Moses

מֵהַמִּדְבָּר֩ <S%H4057><s%> me-ham-mid-Bar From the wilderness וְהַלְּבָנ֨וֹן <S%H3844><s%> ve-hal-le-va-Non and this Lebanon הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh and this וְֽעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- far הַנָּהָ֧ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har river הַגָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol even unto the great נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> ne-har- the river פְּרָ֗ת <S%H6578><s%> pe-Rat, Euphrates כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz all the land הַֽחִתִּ֔ים <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Tim, of the Hittites וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- far הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol and unto the great מְב֣וֹא <S%H3996><s%> me-Vo toward the going down הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-Sha-mesh; of the sun יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become גְּבוּלְכֶֽם׃ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-le-Chem. shall be your coast

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- No יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <S%H3320><s%> yit-yatz-Tzev be able to stand אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish There shall not any man לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha, before כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei thee all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei-cha; of thy life כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher I הָיִ֤יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti have been עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh as I was with Moses אֶהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-Yeh have been עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo No אַרְפְּךָ֖ <S%H7503><s%> 'ar-pe-Cha [so] I will be with thee I will not fail וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo No אֶעֶזְבֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5800><s%> 'e-'ez-Ve-ka. thee nor forsake

חֲזַ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> cha-Zak Be strong וֶאֱמָ֑ץ <S%H553><s%> ve-'e-Matz; and of a good courage כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, you תַּנְחִיל֙ <S%H5157><s%> tan-Chil shalt thou divide for an inheritance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am for unto this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ti which I sware לַאֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tam unto their fathers לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

רַק֩ <S%H7535><s%> rak but חֲזַ֨ק <S%H2388><s%> cha-Zak Only be thou strong וֶֽאֱמַ֜ץ <S%H553><s%> ve-'e-Matz courageous מְאֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, and very לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> lish-Mor that thou mayest observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-sOt to do כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- to all הַתּוֹרָ֗ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah, according to all the law אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוְּךָ֙ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-ve-Cha commanded מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh which Moses עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di, my servant אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תָּס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> ta-Sur thee turn מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at יָמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> ya-Min not from it [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <S%H8040><s%> u-se-Mol; or [to] the left לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so תַּשְׂכִּ֔יל <S%H7919><s%> tas-Kil, that thou mayest prosper בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech. go

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not יָמ֡וּשׁ <S%H4185><s%> ya-Mush shall not depart סֵפֶר֩ <S%H5612><s%> se-Fer This book הַתּוֹרָ֨ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah of the law הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh This מִפִּ֗יךָ <S%H6310><s%> mip-Pi-cha, out of thy mouth וְהָגִ֤יתָ <S%H1897><s%> ve-ha-Gi-ta but thou shalt meditate בּוֹ֙ bo יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam therein day וָלַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> va-Lay-lah, and night לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mor that thou mayest observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot, to do כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- to all הַכָּת֖וּב <S%H3789><s%> hak-ka-Tuv according to all that is written בּ֑וֹ bo; כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> 'az then תַּצְלִ֥יחַ <S%H6743><s%> tatz-Li-ach prosperous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּרָכֶ֖ךָ <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Che-cha thy way וְאָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> ve-'Az and then תַּשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <S%H7919><s%> tas-Kil. and then thou shalt have good success

הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not צִוִּיתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Ti-cha Have not I commanded חֲזַ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> cha-Zak thee;Be strong וֶאֱמָ֔ץ <S%H553><s%> ve-'e-Matz, and of a good courage אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תַּעֲרֹ֖ץ <S%H6206><s%> ta-'a-Rotz be not afraid וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תֵּחָ֑ת <S%H2865><s%> te-Chat; neither be thou dismayed כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עִמְּךָ֙ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech. go פ Peh

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a', Then Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֹׁטְרֵ֥י <S%H7860><s%> sho-te-Rei the officers הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

עִבְר֣וּ׀ <S%H5674><s%> 'iv-Ru Pass בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev through הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh, the host וְצַוּ֤וּ <S%H6680><s%> ve-tzav-Vu and command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying הָכִ֥ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> ha-Chi-nu Prepare לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem צֵידָ֑ה <S%H6720><s%> tzei-Dah; you victuals כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בְּע֣וֹד׀ <S%H5750><s%> be-'od within שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet for within three יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim, days אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you עֹֽבְרִים֙ <S%H5674><s%> 'oe-Rim ye shall pass over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den this Jordan הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> la-Vo to go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> la-Re-shet to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah. you to possess ס sa-Mek

וְלָרֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <S%H7206><s%> ve-la-r-'u-ve-Ni And to the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֔י <S%H1425><s%> ve-lag-ga-Di, and to the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> ve-la-cha-Tzi and to half שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> ham-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar spake יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

זָכוֹר֙ <S%H2142><s%> za-chOr Remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var, the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh which Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> 'e-ved- the servant יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; you saying יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God מֵנִ֣יחַ <S%H5117><s%> me-Ni-ach hath given you rest לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan and hath given לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz you this land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot. likewise
